content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I didn't agree on a final price because we were unable to find a price that both parties could agree on. I, as a student, was on a tight budget, and the landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was looking for a higher price given the prime location of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, at 8.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The negotiation was conducted professionally and respectfully.
name: Haoyu Wang
